2 says (writes) after compliments;
R. 2. 74, 3. 68, 7. 69, 71; 11.
30; 16. 64; 17. 15, 60; Y. 1. 332.

plaud, commend; {#yo ratnarASInapi#}

{#SrUyaMte pariRItAstAH (kanyakAH) pitfBiScA-#}

with {#na#} reject; R. 12. 35. --4 To care

{#pyasmAt prati syAt#} Ś. 1. {#astu#} well, let

forming their periphrastic perfect
is sometimes separated from the
root and used by itself; {#taM pAtayAM#}

ast]. --WITH {#ati#} to be over, excel,

to, be closely connected with.

one's share; {#yanmamABizyAt#} Sk. --2.
to be over. --3. to excel, surpass. --4. to 
[Page0208-b+ 58]
domineer or to tyrannize over, rule
over. {#--Avis#} to arise, spring up, be
visible; {#AcAryakaM vijayi mAnmaTamAvi-#}
{#rAsIt#} Māl. 1. 26. {#--upa#} to be near to
or in. {#--pari#} 1. to be in the way. --2. to
surpass. --3. to pass or spend (time).
--4. to pervade. {#--pra#} 1. to be in front
of. --2. to be in an extraordinary
degree, to preponderate, excel, sur-
pass. {#--prati#} 1. to be equal to, be a
match for. --2. to rival, emulate, vie
with. --3. to be a representative of,
stand in place of. {#--prAdus#} to appear,
spring up; {#prAdurAsIttamonudaH#} Ms. 1. 6;
R. 11. 15. {#--vyati#} (Atm. {#vyatihe, vya-#}
{#tise; vyatiste#}) to excel, surpass, be

{#anyo vyatiste tu mamApi DarmaH#} Bk. 2. 35.
--II 4 P. ({#asyati, Asa, AsTat, a-#}
{#situM, asta#}) 1 To throw, cast, hurl,
discharge, shoot (with loc. of the
mark); {#tasminnAsTadizIkAstraM#} R. 12.
23; Bk. 15. 91, 14. 77; sometimes
with dat. or gen.; {#dasyave hetimasya#} Rv.
1. 103. 3. --2 To drive away, re-
move. --3 To frighten or scare away.
--4 To throw or take away, let go,
leave, give up; as in {#astamAna, asta-#}
{#Soka, astakopa;#} see {#asta#}. --WITH {#ati#}
to shoot beyond or at, overpower
(with arrows); {#atyasta#} having shot
beyond, having surpassed or excel-
led; joined in acc. Tat. comp.; P. II.
1. 24. {#--aBipra#} to throw over or up-
on, hurl at. {#--parini#} to stretch.
--III. 1 U. ({#asati-te, asita#}). 1 To
go. --2 To take or receive, seize. --3
To shine (The examples usually cit-
ed to illustrate this sense are {#nizpra-#}
{#BaSca praBurAsa BUBftAM#} R. 11. 81; {#tenAsa lokaH#}
{#pitfmAn vinetrA#} 14. 23; {#lAvaRya utpAdya#}
{#ivAsa yatnaH#} Ku. 1. 35. But the sense
of {#didIpe#} or ‘shone’ is far-fetched,
though Vāmana is disposed to take
it. It seems preferable to regard {#Asa#}
in these instances as equivalent to
{#baBUva,#} either taking it, as Śākaṭāyana
does, as an indeclinable {#tiNaMtapratirUpaka-#}
{#mavyayaM,#} or considering it, as Vallabha
does, as an ungrammatical form used
against the rules of grammar, {#prAmA-#}
{#dikaH prayogaH;#} see Malli. on Ku. 1. 35).

to cause to move. --2 To let fly,
cast, throw. --3 To raise (as one's
voice). --4 To sprinkle. --III. 9 P.

urge, incite, animate, promote. --IV.

;; Case 1096: L=11373, k1=kf, code=C, mw=kf
{#kf#}¦ I. 5 U. ({#kfRoti-kfRute#}) To hurt,
injure, kill. --II. 8 U. ({#karoti-kurute,#}
{#cakAra-cakre, akArzIt-akfta, kartuM, karizyati-te,#}
{#kfta#}) 1 To do (in general); {#tAta kiM- #}
[Page0417-b+ 57]
{#karavARyahaM#}. --2 To make; {#gaRikAmavaro-#}
{#Damakarot#} Dk; {#nfpeRa cakre yuvarAjaSabda-#}
{#BAk#} R. 3. 35; {#yuvarAjaH kftaH#} &c.
--3 To manufacture, shape, prepare;
{#kuMBakAro GawaM karoti; kawaM karoti#} &c.
--4 To build, create; {#gfhaM kuru; saBAM#}
{#kuru madarTe BoH#} --5 To produce, cause,
engender; {#ratimuBayaprArTanA kurute#} Ś. 2.
1. --6 To form, arrange; {#aMjaliM ka-#}
{#roti; kapotahastakaM kftvA#}. --7 To write,
compose; {#cakAra sumanoharaM SAstraM#} Pt. 1.
--8 To perform, be engaged in; {#pUjAM#}
{#karoti#}. --9 To tell, narrate; {#iti ba-#}
{#huviDAH kaTAH kurvan#} &c. --10 To carry
out, execute, obey; {#evaM kriyate yuzma-#}
{#dAdeSaH#} Māl. 1; or {#karizyAmi vacastava#}
or {#SAsanaM me kuruzva#} &c. --11 To bring
about, accomplish, effect; {#satsaMgatiH#}
{#kaTaya kiM na karoti pusAM#} Bh. 2. 23. --12.
To throw or let out, discharge,
emit; {#mUtraM kf#} to discharge urine, make
water; so {#purIzaM kf#} to void excrement.
--13 To assume, put on, take; {#strIrU-#}
{#paM kftvA; nAnArUpARi kurvARaH#} Y. 3. 162.
--14 To send forth, utter; {#mAnuzIM#}
{#giraM kftvA, kalaravaM kftvA#} &c. --15 To
place or put on (with loc.); {#kaMWe hA-#}
{#ramakaret#} K. 212; {#pARimurasi kftvA#} &c.
--16 To entrust (with some duty),
appoint; {#aDyakzAn viviDAnkuryAttatra#}
{#tatra vipaScitaH#} Ms. 7. 81. --17 To cook
(as food) as in {#kftAnnaM#}. --18 To think,
regard, consider; {#dfzwistfRIkftajagattra-#}
{#yasattvasArA#} U. 6. 19. --19 To take (as
in the hand); {#kuru kare gurumekamayoGa-#}
{#naM#} N. 4. 59. --20 To make a
sound, as in {#KAtkftya, PUtkftya#}
{#BuMkte;#} so {#vazawakf, svAhAkf#} &c. --21 To
pass, spend (time); {#varzARi daSa cakruH#}
spent; {#kzaRaM kuru#} wait a moment. --22
To direct towards, turn the atten-
tion to, resolve on; (with loc. or
dat.); {#nADarme kurute manaH#} Ms. 12. 118;
{#nagaragamanAya matiM na karoti#} Ś. 2. --23
To do a thing for another (either
for his advantage or injury; {#prAptA-#}
{#gninirvApaRagarvamaMbu ratnAMkurajyotizi kiM#}
{#karoti#} Vikr. 1. 18; {#yadanena kftaM mayi,#}
{#asO kiM me karizyati#} &c. --24 To use,
employ, make use of; {#kiM tayA kriyate#}
{#DenvA#} Pt. 1. --25 To divide, break
into parts (with adverbs ending in
{#DA#}); {#dviDA kf#} to divide into two
parts; {#SataDA kf, sahasraDA kf#} &c. --26
To cause to become subject to, re-
duce completely to (a particular
condition, with adverbs ending in 
[Page0417-c+ 57]
{#sAt#}); {#AtmasAt kf#} to subject or
appropriate to oneself; R. 8. 2; {#Ba-#}
{#smasAt kf#} to reduce to ashes. --27 To
appropriate, secure for oneself. --28
To help, give aid. --29 To make
liable. --30 To violate or outrage (as
a girl). --31 To begin. --32 To order.
--33 To free from. --34 To proceed
with, put in practice. --35 To wor-
ship, sacrifice. --36 To make like,
consider equal to, cf. {#tfRIkf#} (said
to be Atm. only in the last 10
senses). This root is often used
with nouns, adjectives, and indeclin-
ables to form verbs from them, some-
what like the English affixes ‘en’
or ‘(i) fy’, in the sense of ‘making
a person or thing to be what it
previously is not’; e. g. {#kfzRIkf#} to
make that which is not already
black, black, i. e. blacken; so {#SvetI-#}
{#kf#} to whiten; {#GanIkf#} to solidify;
{#viralIkf#} to rarefy &c. &c. Some-
times these formations take place
in other senses also; e. g. {#kroqIkf#}
‘to clasp to the bosom’, embrace
{#BasmIkf#} to reduce to ashes; {#pravaRIkf#}
to incline, bend; {#tfRIkf#} to value as
little as straw; {#maMdIkf#} to slacken,
make slow; so {#SUlAkf#} to roast on
the end of pointed lances; {#suKAkf#}
to please; {#samayAkf#} to spend time &c.
N. B. This root by itself admits of
either Pada; but it is Atm. general-
ly with prepositions in the following
senses:--(1) doing injury to; (2)
censure, blame; (3) serving; (4)
outraging, acting violently or rashly;
(5) preparing, changing the condi-
tion of, turning into; (6) reciting.
(7) employing, using; see P. 1. 3.
32 and “Student's Guide to Sanskrit
Composition” § 338. Note. The root
{#kf#} is of the most frequent application
in Sanskrit literature, and its senses
are variously modified, or almost in-
finitely extended, according to the
noun with which the root is connect-
ed; e. g. {#padaM kf#} to set foot (fig. also);
{#ASrame padaM karizyasi#} Ś. 4. 19; {#krameRa#}
{#kftaM mama vapuzi navayOvanena padaM#} K. 141; {#mana-#}
{#sA kf#} to think of, meditate; {#manasi kf#}
to think; {#dfzwvA manasyevamakarot#} K. 136;
or to resolve or determine; {#saKyaM, mEtrIM#}
{#kf#} to form friendship with; {#astrARi#}
{#kf#} to practise the use of weapons;
{#daMqaM kf#} to inflict punishment; {#hfdaye kf#} 
[Page0418-a+ 57]
to pay heed to; {#kAlaM kf#} to die; {#matiM#}
{#dudDiM-kf#} to think of, intend, mean;
{#udakaM kf#} to offer libations of water to
the Manes; {#ciraM kf#} to delay; {#darduraM kf#}
to play on the lute; {#naKAni kf#} to
clean the nails; {#kanyAM kf#} to out-
rage or violate a maiden; {#vinA kf#}
to separate from, to be abandoned
by, as in {#madanena vinAkftA ratiH#} Ku.
4. 21; {#maDye kf#} to place in the middle,
to have reference to; {#maDyekftya sTitaM#}
{#kraTakESikAn#} M. 5. 2; {#vaSe kf#} to win
over, place in subjection, subdue;
{#camatkf#} to cause surprise; make an
exhibition or a show; {#satkf#} to honour,
treat with respect; {#tiryakkf#} to place
aside. --Caus. ({#kArayati-te#}) To cause
to do, perform, make, execute &c.;
{#AjYAM kAraya rakzeBiH#} Bk. 8. 84; {#BftyaM Bftye-#}
{#na vA kawaM kArayati#} Sk. --Desid. ({#cikIrzIti#}
{#-te#}) To wish to do &c.; Śi. 14. 41.
;----------------------------------------------------------------------

;; Case 1332: L=13348, k1=ciMt, code=C, mw=cint
{#ciMt#}¦ 10 U. ({#ciMtayati-te, ciMtita#}) 1

{#vaDaM rAjA manasApi na ciMtayet#} Ms. 8.
381, 4. 258; Pt. 1. 135; Ch. P. 1.

{#tAtastvAM ciMtayizyati#} Ś. 4.; cf. also
R. 1. 64; U. 1. 19. --4 To call to
mind, remember. --5 To find out,
devise, discover, think out; {#kopyupA-#}

Ms. 4. 59. --2 To prove, demonstrate;
Bk. 15. 12. --3 To exhibit, display, 
[Page0576-c+ 56]
make visible; {#tadeva me darSaya deva rUpaM#}

court of justice); Ms. 8. 158. --5

appear, show oneself or anything
belonging to oneself; {#Bavo BaktAn#}

appoint, fix. [The meanings of

word with which it is connected;

upon; {#padaM DA#} to set foot on, to en-

{#Ke…vyApArayAmAsa vilocanAni#} Ku. 3.
67; {#vyApAritaM Sirasi SastrapaSastra pAReH#}
Ve. 3. 19; R. 13 25. --II. 3 P. ({#pipa-#}
{#rti, pUrRaM#}) 1 To bring or carry over. --2
To deliver from, bring out of. --3
To fill. --4 To protect, maintain.
sustain. --5 To promote, advance.
--III. 9. P. ({#pfRAti#}) To protect. --IV.
10 U. ({#pArayati-te;#} sometimes {#pAr#} is
regarded as a separate root) 1 To
carry over or across, ferry over. --2
To reach the other side of anything,
accomplish, perform, achieve, bring
to a conclusion (a vow &c.). --3 To
be able or capable; {#na Kalu mAtApinarO#}
{#BartfviyogaduHKitAM duhitaraM drazwu pArayataH#} Ś.
6.; {#na pArayAmi tAtakASyapasya…Apanna-#}
{#sattvAM SakuMtalAM niMvadayituM#} Ś. 4; {#aDikaM#}
{#na hi pArayAmi vaktu#} Bv. 2. 59. --4 To
deliver, save, extricate, rescue. --5
To withstand, oppose. --6 To live.
--V. 5 P. ({#pfgoti#}) 1 To please or
delight, gratify. --2 To be pleased or
delighted.

;; Case 2393: L=22244, k1=BU, code=C, mw=BU
{#BU#}¦ I 1 P. (rarely A.) ({#Bavati, baBUva,#}
{#aBUt, Bavizyati, BavituM, BUta#}) 1 To be,

{#yadapatyaM BavedasyAM#} Ms. 9. 127; {#BAgyakra-#}
{#meRa hi DanAni BavaMti yAMti#} Mk. 1. 13.
--3 To spring or proceed from, arise;
{#kroDAdBavati saMmohaH#} Bg. 2. 63, 14. 17.
--4 To happen, take place, occur;
{#nAtatAyivaDe dozo haMturBavati kaScana#} Ms. 8.
381; {#yadi saMSayo Bavet#} &c. --5 To live,
exist; {#aBUdaBUtapUrvaH… rAjA ciMtAmaRi-#}
{#rnAma#} Vās.; {#aBUnnfpo vibuDasaKaH paraMtapaH#}
Bk. 1. 1. --6 To be alive or living,
breathe; {#tvamidAnIM na Bavizyasi#} Ś. 6; 
[Page0820-b+ 57]
{#AH cArudattahataka ayaM na Bavasi#} Mk. 4;
{#durAtman prahara nanvayaM na Bavasi#} Māl. 5
(‘thou art a dead man’, thou shalt
breathe no longer); Bg. 11. 32. --7
To remain or be in any state or con-
dition, fare; {#BavAn sTale kaTaM Bavizyati#}
Pt. 2. --8 To stay, abide; remain,
U. 3. 37. --9 To serve, do; {#idaM pAdo-#}
{#dakaM Bavizyati#} Ś. 1. --10 To be pos-
sible (usually with a future tense
in this sense); {#Bavati BavAn yAjayi-#}
{#zyati#} Sk. --11 To lead or tend to,
conduce to, bring about (with
dat.); {#vAtAya kapilA vidyut… pItA#}
{#Bavati sasyAya durBikzAya sitA Bavet#} Mbh.;
{#suKAya tajjanmadinaM baBUva#} Ku. 1. 23;
{#saMsmftirBava BavatyaBavAya#} Ki. 18. 27; {#na#}
{#tasyA rucaye baBUva#} R. 6. 44. --12 To be
on the side of, assist; {#devA arjunato'Ba-#}
{#van#} --13 To belong or pertain to
(often expressed by ‘have’); {#tasya#}
{#ha SataM jAyA baBUvuH#} Ait. Br.; Ms. 6.
39. --14 To be engaged in, be occu-
pied (with loc.); {#caraRakzAlane kfzRo#}
{#brAhmaRAnAM svayaM hyaBUt#} Mb. --15 To
conduct oneself, behave. --16 Ved.
To be prosperous, succeed. Used
with a preceding noun or adjective
{#BU#} serves to form verbs in the sense
of ‘becoming what it previously is
not’ or ‘becoming’ in general; {#Sve-#}
{#tIBU#} to become white; {#kfzRIBU#} to
become black; {#payoDarIBUta#} ‘becom-
ing or serving the purpose of teats’;
so {#kzapaRIBU#} to be or become a mendi-
cant; {#praRiDIBU#} to act the spy; {#A-#}
{#rdrIBU#} to melt; {#BasmIBU#} to be reduced
to ashes; {#vizayIBU#} to form the sub-
ject of; so {#ekamatIBU; taruRIBU#} &c. &c.
Note--The senses of {#BU#} may be vari-
ously modified according to the ad-
verbs with which it is connected;
e. g. {#punarBU#} to marry again; {#a virBU#} to
appear, arise, to be evident or clear;
see {#Avis; tiroBU#} to disappear; {#prAdurBU#}
to arise, be visible, appear; {#agreBU#} to be
in front, take the lead; {#aMtarBU#} to be
absorbed or included; {#ojasyaMtarBavaM-#}
{#tyanye#} K. P. 8; {#dozABU#} to grow even-
ing or dusk-time; {#anyaTA BU#} to be
otherwise, be changed; {#na me vacana-#}
{#manyaTA Bavitumarhati#} Ś. 4; {#puro BU#} to
come forward, stand forth; {#miTyA BU#}
to turn out false; {#vfTA BU#} to become
useless &c. &c.). --Caus. ({#BAvayati-te#})
1 To cause to be or become, call
into existence, call into being. --2 
[Page0820-c+ 57]
To cause, produce, effect. --3 To
manifest, display, exhibit. --4 To
foster, cherish, support, preserve,
enliven; {#punaH sfjati varzARi BagavAn BA-#}
{#vayanprajAH#} Mb.; {#devAn BAvayatAnena te#}
{#devA BAvayaMtu vaH . parasparaM BAvayaMtaH SreyaH#}
{#paramavApsyaTa#} Bg. 3. 11; Bk. 16. 27.
--5 To think or reflect, consider,
fancy, imagine. --6 To look upon,
consider or regard as; {#arTamanarTaM BAva-#}
{#ya nityaM#} Moha M. 2. --7 To prove,
substantiate, establish; Y. 2. 11.
--8 To purify. --9 To get, obtain. --10
To mingle or mix. --11 To change
or transform into. --12 To soak,
steep. --13 To devote or addict one-
self to. --14 To convince. --15 To per-
fume, scent. --Desid. ({#buBUzati#}) To
wish to be or become &c. --II. 1 U.
({#Bavati-te#}) To get, obtain. --III. 10
A. ({#BAvayate#}) To obtain, gain. --IV.

fill, pervade, fill with; {#aBArzIdaDvaninA #}
[Page0824-a+ 57]
{#lokAn#} Bk. 15. 24. --3 To bear, sup-
port, uphold, bear up; {#DuraM DaritryA#}
{#biBarAMbaBUva#} R. 18. 45; {#kUrmo biBarti Da-#}
{#raRIM Kalu pfzWakena#} Ch. P. 50; Bk. 17.
16 --3 To maintain, foster, cherish,
protect, take care of, nourish; {#daridrAn#}
{#Bara kOMteya mA prayacCeSvare DanaM#} H. 1. 15.
--4 To bear, have, possess; {#siMDorbaBA-#}
{#ra salilaM SayanIyalakzmIM#} Ki. 8. 57; {#piSu-#}
{#najanaM Kalu biBrati kzitIMdrAH#} Bv. 1. 74;
{#balitrayaM cAru baBAra bAlA#} Ku 1. 39; {#iM-#}
{#dordEnyaM tvadatusaraRaklizwakAMterbiBarti#} Me.
84; Ś. 2. 4. --5 To wear; {#biBrajja-#}
{#wAmaMqalaM#} Ś. 7. 11; 6. 5; {#vivAhakOtukaM#}
{#lalitaM biBrata eva (tasya)#} R. 8. 1, 10.
10; {#jawASca biBfyAnnityaM#} Ms. 6. 6. --6
To feel, experience, suffer, endure
(joy, sorrow &c.); {#BAvaSudDisahitErmu-#}
{#daM jano nAwakEriva baBAra BojanEH#} Śi. 14.
50; {#saMtrAsamabiBaH SakraH#} Bk. 17. 108;

produce; {#yOvane sadalaMkArAH SoBAM biBra-#}

retain (as in memory). --9 To hire;

{#ti#} Mk. 1. 13. --6 To pass away or
by, elapse (as time); {#yOvanamanivarti#}
{#yAtaM tu#} K. P. 10. --7 To last. --8 To
happen, come to pass. --9 To go or
be reduced to any state, be or be-
come (usually with the acc. of ab-
stract noun). --10 To undertake; {#na#}
{#svasya sidDO yAsyAmi sargavyApAra mAtmanA#}
Ku. 2. 54. --11 To have carnal in-
tercourse with. --12 To request,
implore. --13 To find out, discover.
--14 To behave, act. (The meanings
of {#yA,#} like those of {#gam,#} are variously
modified according to the noun
with which it is connected; e. g.
{#nASaM yA#} to be destroyed; {#vAcyatAM yA#} to
incur blame or censure; {#laGutAM yA#} to
be slighted; {#prakftiM yA#} to regain one's
natural state; {#nidrAM yA#} to fall asleep;
{#vaSaM yA#} to submit, go into one's pos-
session; {#udayaM yA#} to rise; {#astaM yA#} to
set, decline; {#pAraM yA#} to reach the
other side of, to master, surmount,
get over; {#padaM yA#} to attain to the 
[Page0891-b+ 56]
position of; {#agre yA#} to go before,
take the lead, lead; {#aDo yA#} to
sink; {#viparyAsaM yA#} to undergo a
change, to be changed in appear-
ance; {#SirasA mahIM yA#} to bend the
head down to the ground &c.),
--Caus. ({#yApayati-te#}) 1 To cause to
go or proceed. --2 To remove, drive

31. --3 To spend, pass (time): {#tAM-#}
{#vatkokila virasAnM yApaya divasAn#} Bv.
1. 7; Me. 89. --4 To live or spend

port, nourish. --Desid. ({#yiyAsati#})

--WITH {#ati#} 1 to go beyond, trans-
gress, violate. --2. to surpass. {#--aDi#}
to go away or forth; escape; {#kuto'-#}
{#DiyAsyasi kUra nihatastena pAtriBiH#} Bk.
8. 90.

{#stizWati sa bAMDavaH ..#} H. 1. 73. --13
To rest or depend on. --14 To do,
perform, occupy oneself with. --14
(Atm.) To resort or go to (as
an umpire), be guided by the ad-
vice of; {#saMSayya karRAdizu tizWate yaH#} Ki.
3. 14. --16 (Atm.) To offer one-
self to (for sexual embrace),
stand as a prostitute (with dat.);
{#gopI smarAt kfzRAya tizWate#} Sk. on P.
I. 4. 34. --Caus. ({#sTApayati-te#}) 1
To cause to stand. --2 To lay, set,
place, put. --3 To found, establish.
--4 To stop. --5 To arrest, check.
--6 To raise, erect. --7 To cause to
last or continue, make durable. --8 To
give in marriage; Māl. 10. 5. --9
To instruct in, initiate into. --Desid.
({#tizWAsati#}) To wish to stand &c.

--2 To sound, creak.
;----------------------------------------------------------------------
;
;; Case 3620: L=31592, k1=hras, code=C, mw=hras
{#hras#}¦ 1 P. ({#hrasati, hrasita#}) 1 To
sound. --2 To become small or
diminished or lessened, wane, dis-
appear; Pt. 4. 78. --Caus. To
shorten, lessen, diminish.
;----------------------------------------------------------------------
;
;; Case 3621: L=31601, k1=hrAd, code=C, mw=hrAd
{#hrAd#}¦ 1 A. ({#hrAdate#}) --1 To sound.
--2 To roar.
;----------------------------------------------------------------------
;
;; Case 3622: L=31607, k1=hrI, code=C, mw=hrI
{#hrI#}¦ 3 P. ({#jihreti, hrIRa --hrIta#}) 1 To
blush, be modest. --2 To be asham-
ed (used by itself or with abl.
or gen.); {#jihremyAryaputreRa saha gurusamIpaM#}
{#gaMtuM#} Ś. 7. 6; {#anyonyasyApi jihrImaH#}
{#kiM punaH sahavAsinAM#} Ki. 11. 58; R,
15. 44; 17. 73; Bk. 3. 53; 5.
102; 6. 132. --Caus. ({#hrepayati-te#})
To put to shame (fig. also); cause
to blush, make ashamed; {#sakOstuBaM#}
{#hrepayatIva kfzRaM#} R. 6. 49; {#hropitA hi#}
{#bahavo nareSvarAH#} 11. 40; {#kiM vA jAtyA#}
{#svAmino hrepayaMti#} Śi. 18. 23; Ki. 11.
64; 13. 41; Ve. 1. 17.
;----------------------------------------------------------------------
;

;; Case 3630: L=31630, k1=hval, code=C, mw=hval
{#hval#}¦ 1 P. ({#hvalati#}) --1 To go,
move. --2 To shake, tremble.
--Caus. ({#hva-hvA-layati-te,#} but {#hvalayati#}
only with prepositions) To shake,
move, cause to tremble (especially
with {#vi#}).

;; Case 3631: L=31631, k1=hvf, code=C, mw=hvf

flicted or injured.

;; Case 3632: L=31632, k1=hve, code=C, mw=hve
{#hve#}¦ 1 U. ({#hvayati-te, juhAva, juhuve,#}
{#ahvat-ta, ahvAsta, hvAsyati-te, hvAtuM, hUta;#} pass.
{#hUyate;#} caus. {#hvAyayati-te;#} desid. {#juhUzati-te#})
--1 To call by name; {#tAM pArvatItyA-#}
{#Bijanena nAmnA baMDupriyAM baMDujano juhAva#}
Ku. 1. 26. --2 To call out, invoke,
call upon. --3 To call, name. --4 To
challenge. --5 To vie with, emulate.
--6 To ask, beg.
